Description:

Twenty years after the release of the second part of the movie " Ghostbusters" famous team of wrestlers with ghosts coming back! You can easily learn your favorite heroes: the key characters are carefully sketched with Bill Murray , Dan Aykroyd , Harold Ramis and Ernie Hudson . In addition, Aykroyd and Ramis, who worked on the plot of the film, wrote the script for the game. And it means that you are waiting for entertaining, funny and frightening at the same time adventure! The game was conceived as a continuation of the movie . In fact, it replaces the third part of motion pictures and tells about the fate of Ghostbusters. The action takes place two years after the events of Ghostbusters II - Manhattan again precipitated by a variety of otherworldly beings . Fortunately, the citizens know whom to call when meeting with them. Of course, Ghostbusters ! Trap on the belt , blaster for a back and forth - to combat aggressive ectoplasm .

Features: 

The famous team . Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd , Harold Ramis and Ernie Hudson gave the characters their appearance and voiced them . Game Script written by Harold Ramis and Dan Aykroyd .
Continued kinodilogii . Events taking place two years after the final second of the "Ghostbusters ." Playing simultaneously amuses and scares - a hair's breadth , as the famous film Ghostbusters!
Feel like a hunter ! Hold the ghost blaster beam and drive it into an energy trap - you have weapons and special devices Real Ghostbusters .
Individual approach . Otherworldly beings different from each other , many of them require a special approach. To cope with any danger to the hunters have 4 sets of gear and a total of 8 weapons !
Special equipment . Before you catch the ghost , he must track down and field study . It uses special equipment , including the PKE Meter and Ghost Light.
We need upgrading ! Weapons hunters should be improved. Orders received for the money can be spent on upgrading weapons .
